achievements: Re-architected the existing system for Magento platforms to automate tasks of continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) using the Jenkins pipeline, which increased software development efficiencies and saved on average 28% of engineers’ time, allowing for faster time to market.

Automated monthly e-commerce client reports using cron jobs, analyzing earnings from organic traffic, SEO, leads, and marketing, and delivering insights via Cross integration to optimize business performance.

Integrated third-party APIs such as Bing and Google Analytics and implemented daily cron jobs for data storage and analysis, leading to a 34% increase in customer engagement and driving business growth.

Improved lab portal’s performance by 73% through code refactoring, database query optimization, and data normalization, resulting in faster data loading times and greater overall efficiency.

Implemented secure authentication using JWT, session management, and OAuth 2.0 for third-party logins. Integrated multi-factor authentication (MFA) and role-based access control (RBAC) to enhance platform security and user experience.
Provided extensive and thorough written technical portal codebase documentation for purposes of knowledge transfer within the organization.

Engineered a scalable back-end codebase and developed reusable software components for the Content Management System (CMS), resulting in a 67% improvement in user experience across the company's product line.
Developed and customized the products, as per client requirements, which included responsive front-ends and back-ends, using Laravel, Vue.js and CSS frameworks (Bootstrap, Tailwind).
Implemented Single Sign-On (SSO) authentication for seamless user access across multiple services in Niftysol's SaaS platform.
Integrated Stripe and PayPal payment gateways via APIs to enable secure and efficient transactions.

Developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform, creating a seamless online shopping experience that effortlessly integrates with other business systems for streamlined operations and enhanced customer engagement.
Led knowledge-sharing sessions, provided technical support, and mentored interns on both client-side, server-side (full-stack) development.
